data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fu, Yue, Wang, Xinhua, Andersen, Trond (2010): Chinese Paracladius Hirvenoja, with the description of P. ovatus sp. n. (Chironomidae: Orthocladiinae). Zootaxa 2453: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.195235
